subject: Fashion
title: The Jacquard Loom Revolution
description: Learn The Jacquard Loom Revolution in one minute.

hook.text: In 1804 a French weaver used punch cards to program a loom. Sound familiar?

buildup.text: Joseph Marie Jacquard's cards told each thread when to rise or fall.

discovery.text: Complex patterns that took weeks by hand now wove automatically.

twist.text: Those punch cards inspired Charles Babbageâ€”the grandfather of computing.

climax.text: A textile invention became the blueprint for programmable machines.

punchline.text: The computer age was woven on a loom.

quiz.question: How did the Jacquard loom influence computing?
options: Its punch cards inspired early computer programming
